projects: [{"title":"Eradicate Hunger","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"1)Built a web app where volunteers who are leftover with the food can come and help. They can create a parcel and can apply for pickup. 2)Encouraged the engagement of the users by giving the coins according to the quantity of the parcel. These coins can be further redeemed in the form of coupons or other products that will be available on online 'BAZAAR'.3)Created a separate portal for admin to manage all transportations, bazaar productsand, parcels.4)Tech-used: Vue.js, HTML, CSS, JS, Firebase"},{"title":"Event Management","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"1)Built a web app for event management where admin can create an event and manage its participants, as well as the user, can go online for hassle-free registration.2)Tech-used: Vue.js, HTML, CSS, JS, Firebase."},{"title":"HackPro","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Built a prototype of a Web-App for the “MJFCODE-19 hackathon” on Hackerearth. It is focused on management problems of a government body and providing some good features to common people and hospital management"},{}]
